titleStmt.title: Some instructions in the art of grammar writ to assist a young gentleman in the speedy understanding of the Latine tongue.
titleStmt.author: Walker, Obadiah, 1616-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.B. for William Miller ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Attributed to Obadiah Walker. cf. Halkett and Laing.
